## IContainer.untilEmbeddableLoaded() method

Call if you want to wait until an embeddable with that id has finished loading.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
untilEmbeddableLoaded<TEmbeddable extends IEmbeddable>(id: string): Promise<TEmbeddable | ErrorEmbeddable>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<TEmbeddable | ErrorEmbeddable>`
